issue.title: [Java] Implement dictionary-encoded subfields for Struct type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6401](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6401). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement dictionary-encoded subfields for Struct type.

Each child vector will have a dictionary, the dictionary vector is struct type and holds all dictionaries.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6401?focusedCommentId=16931103) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5243
